title: Enacts provisions imposing a moratorium on the planting and growing of genetically modified crops in New York state
summary: Enacts provisions imposing a five year moratorium on the planting and growing of genetically modified crops in New York state and the use of a marketing plan to promote New York state agricultural products; defines "genetically modified crops"; exempts such genetically modified crops planted and grown for the sole purpose of conducting research and not for sale.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the agriculture and markets law, in relation to genetically modified crops
